question:
Consider the following statements about the “Project Brainwave”:
  1. It is an initiative by Microsoft
  2. It aims to promote artificial intelligence based product & services
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First statement is correct because “Project Brainwave” is an initiative by the software giant Microsoft. The project aims to promote product & services based on real-time artificial intelligence (AI). The project uses the massive field-programmable gate array (FPGA) infrastructure that Microsoft has been deploying over the past few years. By attaching high-performance FPGAs directly to data centre network, it can serve DNNs as hardware micro services, where a DNN can be mapped to a pool of remote FPGAs and called by a server with no software in the loop.
